question: When was the Khalsa Panth created ?
explanation: On the day of Vaisakhi ( March 30, 1699 AD), the 10th guru, Guru Gobind Singh ji founded the Khalsa Panth at Kesgarh Saheb, Anandpur. Khalsa Panth is the path of Akal Purakh (Non-Temporal Lord or Almighty) for the sole purpose to spread teachings of true Dharma among the people.
